about.title: Our story
about.story: Born from Italian roots and Dominican markets, Bavarotti serves seafood with vibrant spices and handmade pasta.
about.story2: Every plate is crafted for sharing, with fresh catches, creamy sauces, and coastal heat.
about.highlight3: Fresh daily and cooked to order
